replies.body: I will get moon definitely, and I hope it comes with a new 3ds bundle. Mine is a bit messed up because when I close the top part sometimes it auto shuts down the 3ds and I lose progress, so a new one would be definitely something I would get (unless I get mine fixed). Moon just sounds better IMO, I don't know why. The direct was hype tho, but if they showed gameplay it would have been a bit better.

replies.body:
I hate when people say this. The only two generations with colors for names were Gen1 (Red, Blue, and Yellow) and Gen5 (Black and White/Black2 and White2).
Gen2-4 were all named after minerals. (Yes, gold is primarily a mineral.)
Gen6 was letters. (X and Y)
Gen7 will be...celestial bodies. (Sun and Moon)
Colors aren't exactly a tradition in Pokemon.
replies.body_tagged:
I hate when people say this. The only two generations with colors for names were Gen1 (Red, Blue, and Yellow) and Gen5 (Black and White/Black2 and White2).
Gen2-4 were all named after minerals. (Yes, gold is primarily a mineral.)
Gen6 was letters. (X and Y)
Gen7 will be...celestial bodies. (Sun and Moon)
Colors aren't exactly a tradition in Pokemon.
